## The Idea
At first sight, Google Search and Animal Breeding do not have much in common. But let us have a closer look, maybe the two topics share some interesting features. 

## Google Search
The search website was the first service that Google offers. Since the beginning the Google search engine was very popular among its users, and quickly it became the dominating tool to search content in the internet. Almost two decades after its start, there are no signs that this domination would come to an end anytime soon.
